name: Math Rescue
description: A bone-chilling crisis has struck the world! Reports are pouring in from all corners of the globe: Missing numbers! Drivers on streets are in dangerous peril because the speed limit signs have gone blank! On Wall Street, stockbrokers are throwing up their hands in despair. The Dow Jones isn't down, and it isn't up - it's gone!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core Due 2 Memory: 2 GB RAM

reviews.review_text: Game where you mince the helpless gruzzles into pink goo and order your minion to pour that goo over the other gruzzles causing them to suffer immediate existential crisis, paralyzing them into where they stand. All this so you can gain points and trashcan lids while destroying trains and munching up loads and loads of candy, fruits and .. er.. I think crayons.  Good if you have kids that aren't taught in the ways of numerology just yet, or who have never seen games that are less than 23 years old.
Bad. I played this game way longer than I should have.
